entry.title: install_zabbix
entry.content: 安装 zabbix准备 准备 LNMP 环境 PHP编译参数 123456789./configure --prefix=/usr/local/php-5.5.7 \--with-config-file-path=/usr/local/php-5.5.7/etc --with-bz2 --with-curl \--enable-ftp --enable-sockets --disable-ipv6 --with-gd \--with-jpeg-dir=/usr/local --with-png-dir=/usr/local \--with-freetype-dir=/usr/local --enable-gd-native-ttf \--with-iconv-dir=/usr/local --enable-mbstring --enable-calendar \--with-gettext --with-libxml-dir=/usr/local --with-zlib \--with-pdo-mysql=mysqlnd --with-mysqli=mysqlnd --with-mysql=mysqlnd \--enable-dom --enable-xml --enable-fpm --with-libdir=lib64 --enable-bcmath 下载 zabbix 源码包并上传到服务器 安装 zabbix 服务端解压源码包到/data12$cd /data$tar xf zabbix-3.0.10.tar.gz 编译zabbix1234$cd /data/zabbix-3.0.10$./configure --prefix=/usr/local/zabbix --enable-server --enable-agent --with-mysql/usr/bin/mysql_config --with-net-snmp --with-libcurl --with-libxml2 --enable-proxy$make$make install 创建用户12$groupadd zabbix$useradd -g zabbix zabbix 初始化数据库登录建立数据库并授权 1234create database zabbix character set utf8;create user 'zabbix'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY 'bk@321';grant all on zabbix.* to 'zabbix'@'%' identified by 'bk@321' with grant option;flush privileges; init DB 1234$cd /data/zabbix-3.0.10$mysql -uzabbix -pbk@312 -hlocalhost zabbix < database/mysql/schema.sql $mysql -uzabbix -pbk@312 -hlocalhost zabbix < database/mysql/images.sql$mysql -uzabbix -pbk@312 -hlocalhost zabbix < database/mysql/data.sql 配置zabbix123456$vim /usr/local/zabbix/etc/zabbix_server.conf#修改以下字段DBName=zabbixDBUser=zabbixDBPassword=bk@321ListenIP=127.0.0.1 设置自启动1234567891011$cp /data/zabbix-3.0.10/misc/init.d/fedora/core/zabbix_server /etc/rc.d/init.d/zabbix_server$vim /etc/rc.d/init.d/zabbix_server#修改以下字段BASEDIR=/usr/local/zabbix/$cp /data/zabbix-3.0.10/misc/init.d/fedora/core/zabbix_agent /etc/rc.d/init.d/zabbix_agent$vim /etc/rc.d/init.d/zabbix_agent#修改以下字段BASEDIR=/usr/local/zabbix/$chmod +x /etc/rc.d/init.d/zabbix_server$chmod +x /etc/rc.d/init.d/zabbix_agent$chkconfig zabbix_server on$chkconfig zabbix_agent on 启动服务12$service zabbix_server start $service zabbix_agentd start zabbix管理网站配置复制管理网站12$mkdir /data/site/zabbix$cp -rp frontends/php/* /data/site/zabbix 修改vhost文件新建并打开zabbix.conf1$vim /usr/local/nginx/conf/vhost/zabbix.conf 将以下内容粘贴到zabbix.conf1234567891011121314151617181920server { listen 80; server_name zabbix.xxx.com; index index.html index.php index.html; root /data/site/zabbix; location / { try_files $uri $uri/ /index.php?$args; } location ~ ^(.+.php)(.*)$ { fastcgi_split_path_info ^(.+.php)(.*)$; include fastcgi.conf; fastcgi_pass 127.0.0.1:9000; fastcgi_index index.php; fastcgi_param PATH_INFO $fastcgi_path_info; }} 修改PHP配置文件12345$vim /etc/php.inipost_max_size =16Mmax_execution_time =300max_input_time =300 访问webb并安装web略 安装zabbix agent解压源码包12$cd /data$tar xf zabbix-3.0.10.tar.gz 编译Zabbix1234$cd /data/zabbix-3.0.10$./configure --prefix=/usr/local/zabbix --enable-agent$make$make install 配置zabbix123$vim /usr/local/zabbix/etc/zabbix_agentd.conf#修改以下字段Server=192.168.21.127 设置自启动123456$cp /data/zabbix-3.0.10/misc/init.d/fedora/core/zabbix_agent /etc/rc.d/init.d/zabbix_agent$vim /etc/rc.d/init.d/zabbix_agent#修改以下字段BASEDIR=/usr/local/zabbix/$chmod +x /etc/rc.d/init.d/zabbix_agent$chkconfig zabbix_agent on 启动服务1$service zabbix_agentd start
